author: chesterbelloc
post: Some of the Vignon markings may be arbitrary, but there are some that just don’t make sense without the Shroud, or something like it, being a guide to the artist. Also, it’s strange that most of these markings are unknown in portraits of Christ until the Mandylion was discovered in the 6th century. Just my unqualified and amateur 2 cents..
title: How Valid are the Vignon Markings?
